scripts.index-modules: find . -type d -depth 1 | sed "/node_modules/d" | sed "/.git/d" | while read -r loc; do find "$loc" -type f -iname "*.ts" -depth 1 | sed -e "/index/d" | sed -E "s@$loc/(.*)\.ts@export * from './\1';@" > $loc/index.ts; done
scripts.index-all: find . -type d -depth 1 | sed "/node_modules/d" | sed "/.git/d" | xargs -n1 -I{} find {} -type f -name index.ts | sed -E "s/(.*)\/index.ts/export * from '\1';/" > index.ts
scripts.index: npm run index-modules; npm run index-all;
